attributes.action: to request that the police prosecute channel 4 for broadcasting the episode of Britz 'glorifying violence and a female islamic suicide bomber'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the episode of Britz 'glorifying a female pakistni suicide bomber' was objectional to most people and a one sided view.. It ended up glorifying a suicide bomber..
The final part then goes on to list 'statistics' that suggest 'most' islamic agree with the views of the main role.

Definate action must be taken and laws created on glorification of violence can and should be used..
If the government makes the laws they should at least see that they are followed up.
Then at least people will see why the law was created.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
